document_data.name: Sisters of Istishia
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sisters of Istishia''' were a group of women who worshiped [[Istishia]] as a servant of [[Auril]].
document_data.Activities: The worship from the Sisters appeared to benefit Istishia more than Auril considering several agents from the [[Church of Auril]] were dispatched to find the Sisters and show them the error of their ways.
